attributes.additional_details: For the 2020 A-level results many students were down graded or given their latest mock results without any other consideration for centre assessments or other mock assessments to give a fair and balanced grade; impacting our future choices and decisions.
attributes.background: Many of us have been robbed of opportunity due to the laziness at OFQUAL. I was awarded my last mock results without any regards to my centre grades and other recently sat mocks. This is not a true reflection of my capabilities and I know that there are many others in the same situation.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that GCSE and A-level students will receive their centre assessment grades: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/gcse-and-a-level-students-to-receive-centre-assessment-grades

Prior to this announcement being made, we had published the following petitions, calling for similar actions to your request: 

Reverse all exam grades back to teacher’s own predictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334491

Review the decision to use previous data to calculate exam grades: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306773
